summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests for CKAN's core library components, covering token handling, global configuration, authentication, request utilities, configuration parsing, data preview mechanisms, formatting helpers, URL and markdown utilities, internationalization, I/O helpers, background job processing, email construction, string sanitization, signal emission, and uploader behavior.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of CKAN's foundational library functions through automated testing, ensuring reliable operation across various configurations and edge cases.
